key.name: shortcut
key.summary: Shortcut to open the power menu
key.description: The keybinding to trigger the power menu (e.g., ['<Alt>F5']).

key.name: view-mode
key.summary: Layout mode for the power dial menu
key.description: How to display the power options. Options: 'stacked' (vertical list) or 'tiled' (2x2 grid).

key.name: show-top-bar-icon
key.description: Whether to display the Power Dial icon in the top bar

key.name: tiled-display-mode
key.description: How to display tiles in tiled view. Options: 'label-with-icons' (text with icons), 'icons-only' (icons only), or 'label-only' (labels only).

key.name: restart-confirmation
key.description: Whether to show confirmation before restart. Options: 'confirm' (show dialog) or 'immediate' (execute immediately).

key.name: poweroff-confirmation
key.description: Whether to show confirmation before power off. Options: 'confirm' (show dialog) or 'immediate' (execute immediately).

key.name: logout-confirmation
key.description: Whether to show confirmation before logout. Options: 'confirm' (show dialog) or 'immediate' (execute immediately).
